prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy, stone-like body and vibrant orange accents.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small turtle, with dark blue and brown colors.
Generate a compact Pokemon with a round shape and an eye-catching yellow center.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in caves and has a tough exterior with earthy tones.
Imagine a Pokemon that can curl into a ball, featuring shades of blue and brown.
Design a creature that looks like a rocky shell, perfect for tricking opponents in battle.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies stability and resilience with a striking color palette.
